display_long_description:
Get ready for a fun and exciting adventure as a Car Transport Truck Driver! In this game, you drive a big cargo truck VR that works just like a tow truck, built to carry cars safely across the city.

Your job is to pick up broken-down vehicles, brand-new cars, or even race cars and transport them to the right places. Use ramps, secure the cars, and drive carefully through traffic, bumps, and turns. Every level brings a new challenge!

Whether you're a kid who loves big trucks or a simulation fan who enjoys realistic driving—this game is made for you. Easy controls, colorful graphics, and fun missions make it a perfect mix of learning and play.

Key Features:

Realistic truck driving with smooth controls

Load and unload different types of cars

Fun levels with exciting challenges

Kid-friendly visuals and gameplay

Perfect for car lovers and sim game fans

Hop into the driver’s seat and become the hero of the highway!
